version_description:
- Quest Renewal
- VIP version benefits change
- Chinese support
- Minor bug fixes

- You can complete the boss quest with offline play.
- Bug fixes

增加了辅助效果
英雄，怪物平衡调整
1500，2500舞台奖励更改
（如果您已经清除，奖励将被添加到包中）
Bug修复

Reduced boss HP from high stage.
Fix thief moving bug.
Fix shaman assistive effect bug.

添加前哨基地
所有老板攻击减少12％，惠普降低17％
老板HP超过800个阶段减少25％
修正了老板不使用技能的错误
Etc错误修复

- 添加12种宠物。
- 添加分类按钮到袋子。
- Bug修复

限量版皮肤添加
英雄能力平衡
性能改进

New World Boss Added
Language change Function Added
Knockback effect increased
UI Performance improved
Bug fixes

Guild added
New pets added
Bug fixes
Fixed new game errors in some countries
Fixed server connection error
Kingdom Content Update

- Added 21 kinds of mythical weapons
- Adjustment of weapon attack speed (SPD) calculation method
- Added sub-guild master (permission to build kingdom)
- Guild Master can be dismissed in case of no connection for 5 days
(Sub-guild master can dismiss guild master in 4 days)
- Bug Fixes

Limited edition animal skins have been added.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Added 21 kinds of mythical weapons
- Adjustment of weapon attack speed (SPD) calculation method
- Added sub-guild master (permission to build kingdom)
- Guild Master can be dismissed in case of no connection for 5 days
(Sub-guild master can dismiss guild master in 4 days)
- Bug fixes

- Kingdom items added
- Kingdom watchtower added
- Guild name displayed on PVP
- Chinese numeric unit translation
- Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Add new limited skin
- Add equip state slot
- Increase equipment bag max
- Optimize network data usage
- Account transfer feature support
Added Myth Armor & Accessories
Kingdom PVP, looting content added

Kingdom PVP, looting content added
Fixed equip bug

Kingdom PVP, looting content added
Minor bug fixes

Kingdom PVP, looting content added
Added battle log of other guilds
Fixed bugs

Kingdom PVP, looting content added
Added new Kingdom item 'Castle Portal'
Equipment Bag Max Lv +1
Time Warp Max Lv +5
Bug fixes

Contribution increased in looting in the kingdom
Abilities of heroes adjusted

Contribution increased in looting in the kingdom
Abilities of heroes adjusted
Fixed material synthesis bug

Press and hold the Composite Material button to continue compositing.
You can pause heroes on the expedition.
The irregular resurrection time is fixed at 1 second.
Improved performance

Thief's automatic skill bug has been fixed in English version.
The cooldown balls that appear in PVP are placed more evenly.

Fellowship balance adjustment
Added New Item
Added Master Battle
Improved Background Play UI
Crystal Store Update
iPhone XS, XR support
The 'kingdom looting' content has been redesigned.
Bug fixed
Rune craft content has been added.

Reduced chance of dropping low-grade equipment at high stages.
A formula has been added to add one socket to the equipment.
Bug fixes
Bugs fixed and stability improved.

Limited edition animal skins have been added.
Bug fixes
New World Bosses have been added.

Increased chance to find Gold Dragon dungeon
Adjusted PVP entry limit to 100 times a day
Bug fixed

The maximum number of tickets for ‘Sky Tower' has been increased to 8.
Ad bug fixed.

- New hero 'Seeker' Update!
- Attendance contents Update!
- Growth package 1,2 Update!
- Max 'equipment bag Lv' up
- Max 'Fellowship Lv' up
Pet graphics bug fixed

- New hero ‘Bard' update
- Seeker's skill balance update
- Server stabilization

[ Special Event Update ]
- HEROES WELCOME EVENT
- WELCOME BACK HEROES EVENT
- KINGDOM’S SUPPORT EVENT
- WEEKLY BUFF EVENT
Build Stabilization
